purpose: Explain the concept of customer experience management
title: What is customer experience management?

content: Designing and operating a business that makes decisions centered on an understanding of its customers’ needs and wants (across all channels and products), creating greater economic value from those customers
Always holistic – Usually enterprise, or at least a discrete line of business
Designing and reacting to customer interactions to meet or exceed customer expectations and thus increase customer satisfaction, loyalty and advocacy
Often limited to a function or product
Designing products to meet the expectations of a user
